scripts.build: vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const targetDir = path.resolve(__dirname, '../frontend/public'); if (!fs.existsSync(targetDir)) fs.mkdirSync(targetDir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync(path.resolve(__dirname, '../backend/public/widget.js'), path.join(targetDir, 'widget.js'));"
